paragraphs.text: Maximize your view with the Galaxy A06 5G 17.13 cm large display*. Smooth 90 Hz scrolling and the HD+ U-Cut display gives you more room to enjoy your content. Experience the upgrade.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown. *Measured diagonally, the screen size is 17.13 cm in the full rectangle and 16.73 cm accounting for the rounded corners. Actual viewable area is less due to the rounded corners and the camera cutout. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
Say no to noise Focus on voice
Built to last on the OS upgrades

Step up your mobile experience with the sleek Galaxy A06 5G. Now with reduced thickness* from 0.88cm to 0.8cm. The Galaxy A06 5G features a sleek, sophisticated design in Light Green, Light Gray, and Black, making a bold statement.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown. *Color availability may vary by country, region or carrier. *The reduced thickness from 0.88 cm to 0.8 cm is compared to the previous model Galaxy A05. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
The Galaxy A06 5G features MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor* for seamless gaming, video streaming, and social media.

Background images generated with Adobe Firefly AI engine. Image simulated for illustrative purposes.*MediaTek is trademark/registered trademark of MediaTek Inc. All third party logos, marks, images are trademarks/registered trademarks of respective third party's brand/ owner. Actual product may differ from the image shown.**Memory/storage options and availability may vary by country, region or carrier. Available memory/storage capacity is subject to preloaded software.

Galaxy A06 5G supports up to 12 bands of 5G network, giving you awesome 5G experience and lightning-fast connectivity. So stream, game, or download on the move with reliable 5G speeds* that keep up with your lifestyle.
*Requires optimal 5G connection. 5G services are only supported in 5G network enabled locations. Actual speed may vary depending on country, carrier, and user environment.
Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.Color availability may vary by country, region or carrier. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
Discover the power of the Galaxy A06 5G’s 50MP main camera and 2 MP depth camera. Experience the freedom to capture stunning, quality photos.

Background images generated with Adobe Firefly AI engine. Images simulated for illustrative purposes.
*Individual results may vary depending upon light or shooting condition
Click high-quality selfies that preserve even the smallest details with minimal noise.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown. Background images generated with Adobe Firefly AI engine. Images simulated for illustrative purposes.
*Individual results may vary depending upon light or shooting condition
Eliminate all background sounds with Noise Cancellation*.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Colors may be subject to availability. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
UI/UX may differ.
*Voice focus filters and reduces background noise while on a call for better experience, individual results may vary. Available on select devices and CS (Native) calls.
With IP54* protection, enjoy peace of mind throughout your day. Be it splashes of water or dust, Galaxy A06 5G’s durability can handle surprises, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
*Galaxy A06 5G is rated as IP54. Based on lab test conditions, the device is sprayed by 10 liters of fresh water per minute for 5 minutes at all angles. Not advised for beach or pool use. Water and dust resistance of device is not permanent and may diminish over time due to normal wear and tear.
Offered with up to 4 generations of OS upgrades* and 4 years of security updates*, your Galaxy A06 5G stays up-to-date for longer.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown. *The OS upgrade and security update policies specified above are subject to change. Availability and timing of Android OS upgrades and security updates may vary by device model and market.
Enjoy more of what you love without worrying about battery life—the Galaxy A06 5G lasts longer with its 5,000 mAh (typical) battery*. And with 25 W Fast Charging**, it's back in action quickly.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. *The rated capacity of 4,855 mAh is the typical value, which is tested under third-party laboratory conditions. This typical value represents the estimated average value, taking into account the deviation in battery capacity among the samples tested in accordance with the IEC 61960 standard. Actual battery life varies on network conditions, features, app activity, call & message frequency, charging cycles and other factors.**The Wall Charger for Super Fast Charging (25 W) is sold separately.
Unlocking is easy with the side fingerprint sensor. It offers reliable single-press access and lets you set double-press shortcuts for your camera or other frequently used apps.
Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.
Samsung Knox Vault* is like a safe within a safe, physically isolating PINS, passwords and other private information so hackers can’t gain access.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.*Security features or hardware/software architecture of Samsung Knox Vault on Samsung Galaxy A series smartphones may differ from those on Samsung Galaxy flagship devices including S series, Z series, S FE series smartphones and Tab S series tablets launched from 2021 onwards. Availability of Samsung Knox Vault may vary depending on the device model.
Redesigned app icons and UI* enhance visibility and strengthen Galaxy identity
Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.*The provided UI is illustrative and may differ from the actual UI due to updates and changes.
Easily access the quick panel and notifications with simple swipe gestures
Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown. The provided UI is illustrative and may differ from the actual UI due to updates and changes.
Customize widgets* by choosing different sizes and playful shapes.

Image simulated for illustrative purposes. Actual product may differ from the image shown.*The provided UI is illustrative and may differ from the actual UI due to updates and changes. All third party logos/ marks shown are registered/owned/licensed logos/ marks of respective brand owners. Google is trademark/registered trademark of Google LLC.
Sharing files is a breeze with Quick Share*. It’s fast, easy, and secure.

Actual UI may be different. Image simulated for illustrative purposes. *Available on devices with One UI 2.1 or above, with Android Q OS version or higher installed. Bluetooth Low Energy and Wi-Fi connection are both required for Quick Share. Supports Galaxy Books, including Qualcomm-based PCs released in 2020 and later, and Windows PCs with Intel Bluetooth/Wi-Fi from other manufacturers. (OS: Windows 10 2004 version or higher, Bluetooth driver: Intel 22.50.02 or higher, Wi-Fi driver: Intel 22.50.07 or higher). Number of devices Quick Share can share to at the same time may vary depending on the Wi-Fi chip hardware of the sharing device. Actual speed may vary depending on device, network condition and user environment. The transferable type, number, capacity and expiry date of files, as well as the number of simultaneous file shares in Private Share may be limited.
Achieve your health goals with Samsung Health* integrated into the Galaxy A06 5G. From fitness tracking to health monitoring, get real-time insights and guidance tailored to your needs.
Actual UI may be different. Image simulated for illustrative purposes. *Available functions may vary depending on the device, country, region, carrier or the version of One UI.

With Digital Wellbeing features*, Galaxy A06 5G helps you manage screen time and reduce distractions. With concentration mode you can limit the use of apps in certain times of the day. Select the mode you want to adjust, track app usage, set limits, and use focus mode to stay centered.
Actual UI may be different. Image simulated for illustrative purposes. *Available functions may vary depending on the device, country, region, carrier or the version of One UI.

*Actual UI may be different. Image simulated for illustrative purposes.
**For more information on Smart Switch and Quick Share, visit their feature service landing pages on Samsung.com.
***Available on devices with One UI 2.1 or above, with Android Q OS version or higher installed. Bluetooth Low Energy and Wi-Fi connection are both required for Quick Share. Supports Galaxy Books, including Qualcomm-based PCs released in 2020 and later, and Windows PCs with Intel Bluetooth/Wi-Fi from other manufacturers. (OS: Windows 10 2004 version or higher, Bluetooth driver: Intel 22.50.02 or higher, Wi-Fi driver: Intel 22.50.07 or higher). Number of devices Quick Share can share to at the same time may vary depending on the Wi-Fi chip hardware of the sharing device. Actual speed may vary depending on device, network condition and user environment. The transferable type, number, capacity and expiry date of files, as well as the number of simultaneous file shares in Private Share may be limited.
****Available functions may vary depending on the device, country, region, carrier or the version of One UI.

Galaxy A06 5G combines style, durability, and performance in a sleek 8.0 mm design, available in Light Green, Light Gray, and Black. Its 90 Hz display ensures smooth, immersive viewing. With a 5,000 mAh battery and 25 W Fast Charging, you can enjoy more of what you love without worrying about power. Compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, it features enhanced IP54 durability and 5G support for quicker, more reliable connectivity. It also offers 4 generations of OS upgrades and 4 years of security maintenance, keeping your phone updated and secure.
Yes. Galaxy A06 5G supports 5G connectivity, offering faster loading, lower latency, and a more reliable connection compared to its LTE counterpart.
Galaxy A06 5G offers enhanced durability compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, with an upgraded IP54 rating for dust and water resistance.

Galaxy A06 5G is suitable for smooth gaming with its powerful MediaTek Dimensity 6300 and 17.13 cm display featuring a 90 Hz refresh rate. Whether gaming, streaming videos, or browsing social media, it ensures responsive performance and immersive visuals.

Galaxy A06 5G offers robust security with 4 generations of OS upgrades and 4 years of security maintenance, ensuring long-term protection. It’s safeguarded by Samsung Knox Vault for hardware-level security and provides protection against both hardware and software attacks.

content.title: Samsung Galaxy Experience
content.subtitle: Track your health with Samsung Health
content.content: Sharing files is a breeze with Quick Share*. It’s fast, easy, and secure. Actual UI may be different. Image simulated for illustrative purposes. *Available on devices with One UI 2.1 or above, with Android Q OS version or higher installed. Bluetooth Low Energy and Wi-Fi connection are both required for Quick Share. Supports Galaxy Books, including Qualcomm-based PCs released in 2020 and later, and Windows PCs with Intel Bluetooth/Wi-Fi from other manufacturers. (OS: Windows 10 2004 version or higher, Bluetooth driver: Intel 22.50.02 or higher, Wi-Fi driver: Intel 22.50.07 or higher). Number of devices Quick Share can share to at the same time may vary depending on the Wi-Fi chip hardware of the sharing device. Actual speed may vary depending on device, network condition and user environment. The transferable type, number, capacity and expiry date of files, as well as the number of simultaneous file shares in Private Share may be limited. Achieve your health goals with Samsung Health* integrated into the Galaxy A06 5G. From fitness tracking to health monitoring, get real-time insights and guidance tailored to your needs.

content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.subtitle: Does Galaxy A06 5G support 5G?
content.content: Galaxy A06 5G combines style, durability, and performance in a sleek 8.0 mm design, available in Light Green, Light Gray, and Black. Its 90 Hz display ensures smooth, immersive viewing. With a 5,000 mAh battery and 25 W Fast Charging, you can enjoy more of what you love without worrying about power. Compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, it features enhanced IP54 durability and 5G support for quicker, more reliable connectivity. It also offers 4 generations of OS upgrades and 4 years of security maintenance, keeping your phone updated and secure. Yes. Galaxy A06 5G supports 5G connectivity, offering faster loading, lower latency, and a more reliable connection compared to its LTE counterpart. Galaxy A06 5G offers enhanced durability compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, with an upgraded IP54 rating for dust and water resistance.

headings.text: What are the key features of Galaxy A06 5G?
How does the durability of Galaxy A06 5G compare to that of Galaxy A06 LTE?
How suitable is Galaxy A06 5G for gaming?

paragraphs.text: Galaxy A06 5G combines style, durability, and performance in a sleek 8.0 mm design, available in Light Green, Light Gray, and Black. Its 90 Hz display ensures smooth, immersive viewing. With a 5,000 mAh battery and 25 W Fast Charging, you can enjoy more of what you love without worrying about power. Compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, it features enhanced IP54 durability and 5G support for quicker, more reliable connectivity. It also offers 4 generations of OS upgrades and 4 years of security maintenance, keeping your phone updated and secure.
Yes. Galaxy A06 5G supports 5G connectivity, offering faster loading, lower latency, and a more reliable connection compared to its LTE counterpart.
Galaxy A06 5G offers enhanced durability compared to Galaxy A06 LTE, with an upgraded IP54 rating for dust and water resistance.

Galaxy A06 5G is suitable for smooth gaming with its powerful MediaTek Dimensity 6300 and 17.13 cm display featuring a 90 Hz refresh rate. Whether gaming, streaming videos, or browsing social media, it ensures responsive performance and immersive visuals.

Galaxy A06 5G offers robust security with 4 generations of OS upgrades and 4 years of security maintenance, ensuring long-term protection. It’s safeguarded by Samsung Knox Vault for hardware-level security and provides protection against both hardware and software attacks.
